options.name: Trained Assistants
options.description: The origin of the Gloxy involves being assistants, and that has carried into their culture. Gain +1 Scribing and +1 Arcanum

options.name: Protection Magic
options.description: The Gloxy culture heavily favors Abjuratation Magic which was used to protect their former Vethi masters. Learn 2 Beginner and Novice Abjuration Spells and gain +1 Spell Damage.

options.name: A Desire to Help
options.description: The Gloxy culture believes in helping those with less experience. When you make an Assisted Check with a Skill that has a Bonus Modifier equal to or higher than the Bonus Modifier of the Skill you are Assisting, add a 1d4 to their check instead of rolling an Assisted Check.

options.name: Always Free
options.description: The Gloxy cherish freedom and are particularly suspicious when they feel as if their liberty is threatened. Gain +1 Insight and +1 Resistance.

options.name: Holistic Medicine
options.description: The Gloxy culture values an all-around approach to healing, requiring good food, medicine and alchemical concoctions. Gain +1 Alchemy, +1 Medicine and +1 Cooking.

options.name: Skilled Linguists
options.description: The Gloxy culture prides itself on learning new Languages and accurately reproducing the dialects. Gain +1 Performance and learn 2 non-Magical Languages.

options.name: Manipulators of Magic
options.description: You cannot fail an Essence Burn and can additionally perform an Essence Burn on a Conduit that is not bound to you. Additionally, when you Bond with a Conduit, you get credit for a Bond that is one tier higher.
